introduction: Alina and her husband Peter , had lost his son in a car accident . They came to Moldova birthplace Alina , trying to adopt a child . Păvălaş reminds him of his lost son .Irina fled from Italy and returned to find the child . Meets with her friend , Tatiana , and together go in search of Păvălaş Transnistria . The two women go through various mishaps .Unfortunately, Bruno , pimp , finds Irina , and it is his duty to give him a lesson " whore " . Bruno has a high opinion of him ... in fact , he treats them as do other pimps . Irina Ȋi provides a respite for three days to sell the baby and give back the money invested in it. Bruno gives him an ultimatum : Money or child , otherwise the child will sell on the black market place has enough connections.Irene is terrified. She tries to keep him away from her baby at the same time trying to find a solution to Păvălaş . But the tragedy happened . Irina dies in the arms of her son . He had only seven days to fix it and prove her son that her love for him will never die . Did not want to leave .... she was forced to do so. But now it is late .
